long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Built for FastWriter.io, this extension is a game-changer for content creators, authors, aspiring writers, and anyone involved in blogs, books, and course creation. It seamlessly integrates with your chrome browser and works with both ChatGPT and Claude.ai. 

🟢Key Features:
1️⃣Content Title Generator: Instantly create compelling, genre-specific book titles to kickstart your project or overcome writer's block.
2️⃣Basic Content Outline Creator: Quickly generate a structured outline for your blog, book, or course, complete with chapters and subchapters, tailored to your chosen genre. The structured markdown output is preformatted to align with the fastwriter.io import template
3️⃣Advanced Content Outline Generator: Dive deeper with a more detailed outline, perfect for complex narratives or non-fiction works. The structured markdown output is preformatted to align with the fastwriter.io import template

🟢Why Install:
⌚Save Time: Generate ideas and structures in seconds, not hours.
🤔Overcome Writer's Block: Get inspired with AI-generated titles and outlines.
👩‍💻Improve Organization: Start your writing process with a clear, well-structured plan.
📝Versatile: Suitable for fiction, non-fiction, and various genres.
😉User-Friendly: Simple interface that integrates smoothly with your browsing experience.

Whether you're a seasoned author or a first-time writer, this extension provides the creative spark and structural support you need to bring your blog, book, and course ideas to life. Transform your writing process and unleash your creativity with just a few clicks!
